Articles.Content: So, it was quite a while since .18, and the look of VAB based parts is getting old. They are not bad, but the contrast between them and newly implemented parts is quite significant. Looking at the Rockomax Jumbo-64 and Twin-Boar, even if they have the similar size and purpose, they look quite different. I think the revamp would be needed.
You may have missed the dev notes over the last month or two where Porkjet reveals he's...doing exactly that.

13 hours ago, NathanKell said:

You may have missed the dev notes over the last month or two where Porkjet reveals he's...doing exactly that.

Oh, sorry, I was not active for last 2 months, because I had some IRL Stuff.Good thing to know!
